Posts.Content: Mar 28, 2008 05:17AM kerry32 wrote: Jeannette, I had my surgery 3 days after you and i am starting to notice more twinging then i did earlier on.  I'm thinking that could be the nerve endings healing...but not sure.  It's not too bad just periodic in certain spots and I also have a lot of numbness in the area above where the scars are -the breast bone area? - don't like that feeling - I'm even sensitive to a flap of the coat or sweat shirt hitting there. i had therapy the 2nd week after for a few visits but that's it - so not sure if that is making it worse for you.  I also agree with the sleeping position difficulty - i'm still on the couch - the back of it gives me some support if i can somewhat prop onto my side to give my back a break. hopefully everything will settle down soon

Posts.Content: Mar 16, 2008 04:39PM kerry32 wrote: I think it might depend on how long you're going to be in the hospital when you decide what to pack.  I was only there one night and my bag got put in a closet and never came out until it was time to go home.  I was done at 10:00 am and discharged at 11:30 am the next day - so had no time to do or need anything...

Posts.Content: Apr 9, 2008 07:47AM kerry32 wrote: Becca, I am about 6 weeks out and doing great.  In looking back on the whole surgery and recovery process I would not have any complaints.  I had a bilateral and there was very little pain at all - i would say more a twinge here and there.  You will do just fine I'm sure and I pray that you're path report comes out great!
Posts.Title: Mastectomy 4/10/08 becca44 danix5

Posts.Content: Aug 28, 2008 05:25PM kerry32 wrote: I saw a plastic surgeon recently after 4 months from bilateral no recon.  He explained the dog ears which i do have small ones - if there is extra fat that a small woman doesn't have it will be emphasised and you will have them.  He said the chub was there and then when you take the breast off and stitch you are left with that pooch and its just more obvious.  I wasn't greatly over weight but i was large busted.  He did say he could take care of it though if i want him to.
